article.title: Lockheed Martin Wins Advanced Hawkeye Airborne Early Warning Radar Contract
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: Lockheed Martin has received a low rate initial production contract valued at $171.8 million from Northrop Grumman Aerospace Systems in Bethpage, New York, for four AN/APY-9 airborne early warning radar systems and spare parts. The radar systems will be integrated into the U.S. Navy's new E-2D Advanced Hawkeye aircraft.
